description: Learn Python while training as a tribute in a dystopian survival competition

exclamation: May the odds be ever in your favor!
greeting: Welcome to the Training Center, tribute!

layer_2_universal.CELEBRATION: Outstanding work, tribute! Your survival skills grow stronger with each challenge!
layer_2_universal.OPENING_FLAVOR: Your training begins now. Every skill could save your life!
layer_2_universal.CLOSING_FLAVOR: You've completed your training! May the odds be ever in your favor.

introduction.CONTEXT_INTRO: Welcome to {{school}}! Your survival training continues with today's challenge.
introduction.CONTEXT_PROJECT_INTRO: Time for training, tribute! Today you'll build essential skills that could save your life.
introduction.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_INTRO: Smart tributes anticipate outcomes before acting. Study the code and predict what will happen.
introduction.CONTEXT_FILL_BLANKS_INTRO: Every tribute must know their fundamentals. Complete these training exercises to prove your skills.
introduction.CONTEXT_SPOT_DIFFERENCE_INTRO: Attention to detail can mean life or death! Compare these code versions and spot what's different.
introduction.CONTEXT_CODE_ORDERING_INTRO: A tribute's actions must be in the right sequence. Arrange these code lines in the correct order.
introduction.CONTEXT_MATCH_OUTPUT_INTRO: Connect each code snippet to its output. A tribute must know exactly what their actions will produce.
introduction.CONTEXT_DECODE_ERROR_INTRO: Alert! System malfunctions detected! Analyze these error messages and understand what went wrong.
introduction.CONTEXT_COMPLETE_FUNCTION_INTRO: {{mentor}} has started building new survival tools. Complete the functions to finish the job.
introduction.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_INTRO: Emergency at {{school}}! Several training systems have malfunctioned!
introduction.CONTEXT_FIX_STYLE_INTRO: Even working code can be improved. A smart tribute writes clean, efficient code.
introduction.CONTEXT_DISCOVERY_INTRO: Welcome, new tribute! Today you begin your preparation for the challenges ahead.

learning.CONTEXT_LEARNING_OBJECTIVE: Master these fundamental skills to increase your chances of survival.
learning.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_PURPOSE: This skill helps you anticipate dangers before they strike - essential for any tribute!

narrative.CONTEXT_INCREMENTAL_NARRATIVE: Like all survivors, you'll build your skills step by step.
narrative.CONTEXT_CODE_SAMPLE_NARRATIVE: A fellow tribute submitted this code. It works, but can you spot what needs improvement?

tasks.CONTEXT_STUDENT_TASK: Now it's your turn, tribute. Apply what you've learned!
tasks.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_MISSION: As a member of the Debug Squad, you must identify each bug and restore the systems.

guidance.CONTEXT_SUCCESS_CRITERIA: Your code should produce exactly the expected output.
guidance.CONTEXT_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDANCE: Start simple, then build up your solution step by step.

completion.CONTEXT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY: Training complete! Run your code to see your survival system in action!
completion.CONTEXT_VERIFICATION_COMPLETE: Verification complete! Check how your predictions matched the actual results.
completion.CONTEXT_ROLE_COMPLETE: Excellent work, tribute! You've proven your skills in this training exercise.
completion.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_COMPLETE: All systems restored! The Training Center is operational thanks to your debugging skills.
completion.CONTEXT_IMPROVEMENT_COMPLETE: Great work! Your refactored code is now efficient and reliable.
completion.CONTEXT_TRIUMPH_COMPLETE: Congratulations, tribute! You've completed this challenge and grown stronger!

phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_1: Every tribute starts here. Master this fundamental skill before moving on.
phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_2: Good progress! Now let's expand your abilities.
phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_3: You're getting stronger! Time for more challenging drills.
phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_4: Final challenge! Combine everything you've learned.

challenges.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_1: Read the code carefully. What will appear on screen?
challenges.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_2_NARRATIVE: This code demonstrates an important technique. Predict the output.
challenges.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_2: Pay attention to how values are combined.
challenges.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_3_NARRATIVE: Tributes must see beyond the obvious. What will this code produce?
challenges.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_3: Watch for the difference between variable names and string values.
challenges.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_4_NARRATIVE: Calculate the result in your head before running the code.
challenges.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_4: Remember how Python handles this operation.
challenges.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_5_NARRATIVE: The final test! Predict this calculation correctly.
challenges.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_5: Think about which operations happen first.

exercises.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_1_NARRATIVE: Start with the basics. Every tribute needs this fundamental skill.
exercises.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_2_NARRATIVE: Build on what you learned. This gets a bit more challenging.
exercises.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_3_NARRATIVE: Practice makes perfect. Apply your growing skills here.
exercises.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_4_NARRATIVE: Combine multiple techniques in this final challenge.

comparisons.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_1_NARRATIVE: One version works, one fails. Can you spot why?
comparisons.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_2_NARRATIVE: Both run without errors, but they produce different results. Why?
comparisons.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_3_NARRATIVE: A subtle difference causes a big problem. Find it!

orderings.CONTEXT_ORDERING_1_NARRATIVE: Arrange these lines so the program runs correctly.
orderings.CONTEXT_ORDERING_2_NARRATIVE: Put the operations in the right order.
orderings.CONTEXT_ORDERING_3_NARRATIVE: Make the output tell a coherent story.
orderings.CONTEXT_ORDERING_4_NARRATIVE: Each step depends on the previous one. Get the order right!

match_sets.CONTEXT_MATCH_SET_1_NARRATIVE: Connect each code snippet to its output.
match_sets.CONTEXT_MATCH_SET_2_NARRATIVE: These snippets mix strings and numbers. Match carefully!

errors.CONTEXT_ERROR_1_NARRATIVE: This code crashed! Analyze the error message to understand why.
errors.CONTEXT_ERROR_2_NARRATIVE: Python couldn't even run this code. What's wrong?
errors.CONTEXT_ERROR_3_NARRATIVE: An invalid operation caused this crash. Identify and fix it.

functions.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_1_NARRATIVE: Complete this function to format a tribute introduction.
functions.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_2_NARRATIVE: Build a function that displays a tribute's training scores.
functions.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_3_NARRATIVE: Create a function that calculates supply points and formats the result.

cases.CONTEXT_CASE_1_NARRATIVE: A training simulation is producing wrong results!
cases.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_1: Look at the variable types. Is something stored incorrectly?
cases.CONTEXT_CASE_2_NARRATIVE: The scoreboard shows the wrong information!
cases.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_2: Check what's inside the quotes. Is a variable being printed correctly?
cases.CONTEXT_CASE_3_NARRATIVE: Calculations look correct, but the output is wrong!
cases.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_3: Trace which variable is actually being printed.
cases.CONTEXT_CASE_4_NARRATIVE: The message system is crashing with a type error!
cases.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_4: Can you combine strings and numbers directly with +?

styles.CONTEXT_STYLE_1_NARRATIVE: This code works but uses terrible variable names.
styles.CONTEXT_STYLE_FIX_1: Rename the variables to be clear and descriptive.
styles.CONTEXT_STYLE_2_NARRATIVE: This code is cramped and hard to read.
styles.CONTEXT_STYLE_3_NARRATIVE: This code needs a complete style overhaul.
styles.CONTEXT_STYLE_FIX_3: Apply all style improvements: names, spacing, and modern string formatting.

discovery.CONTEXT_DISCOVERY_NARRATIVE: Study how experienced tributes use these techniques. Predict the outcomes before running the code.

guidance.CONTEXT_GUIDANCE_INTRO: Now practice with support. We'll guide you through each step.
guidance.CONTEXT_GUIDANCE_NARRATIVE: Complete these guided exercises. The structure is provided - you fill in the details.

growth.CONTEXT_GROWTH_INTRO: Time to go solo! Create your own solution using what you've learned.
growth.CONTEXT_GROWTH_NARRATIVE: No more hand-holding. Show us what you can do, tribute!
